DOC.brief_summary: To assess safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics , pharmacodynamics ascend , single subcutaneous intravenous dos IMA-026 healthy Japanese male subject
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating IMA-026 Healthy Japanese Males
DOC.criteria: Men age 20 40 year , inclusive , screen Body mass index ( BMI ) range 17.6 26.4 kg/m2 body weight > 45 kg Healthy determine investigator basis medical history , physical examination , clinical laboratory test result , vitals sign , 12 lead ECG .
